statements: DELETE FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1 AND hair_color = 'Blonde';
DELETE FROM player_preferences WHERE hair_style = 'Short' AND clothing_style = 'Casual';
DELETE FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 101 AND favorite_color = 'Blue';
DELETE FROM customization_options WHERE option_type = 'Skin' AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM player_customization WHERE player_id = 101 AND customization_id = 201;
DELETE FROM CharacterCustomizations WHERE player_id = 100 AND facial_hair = 'Beard';
DELETE FROM CharacterOutfits WHERE armor_level > 50 AND player_id = 200;
DELETE FROM character_options WHERE option_category = 'Background' AND option_value = 'Blue';
